name: Orbit (itch) (Taiger, che-seri, IVB Productions, SlappyHappy2000)
description:
Protect the planet!

Control the orbit of your planet to avoid obstacles, and watch your population grow.
And once the planet is full...

Controls

Click + drag to change orbit size
Scroll wheel to zoom in and out
Click planet once it has cities to change rotation direction

Credits

Programming: Taiger
Art: che-seri
Music: IVB Productions
Music+Sounds: SlappyHappy2000
